publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-593.3 Fiona Hyslop: Reforming Child Protection in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-593) in the name of Peter Peacock, leave out from "continue" to end and insert "acknowledges its own role in increasing the scale, pace and range of staff recruitment in social work and child care and protection to ensure there are sufficient, well-paid staff to meet current and projected needs, and agrees to review the role and powers of the Social Work Services Inspectorate in this area."
